name: @ondewo/ondewo-csi-client-js
description: ONDEWO Communication System Integration (CSI) Client library for Js
author: ONDEWO GmbH <office@ondewo.com>

scripts.build: docker run -it -v ${PWD}:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/../api:/output-volume ondewo-js-proto-compiler ondewo-csi-api ondewo-csi-api ondewo
scripts.build-update: npm run build-only && npm run start-example
scripts.start-example: sudo cp lib/csi.js example/lib/csi.js && http-server example
scripts.build-sample: docker run -it -v ${PWD}/src:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/src/../api:/output-volume $npm_package_config_compiler csi ondewo-csi-api ondewo-csi-api ondewo
